content:
By Britt Around Town • The Cardinal Contributing Writer

As the vibrant colors of summer gradually give way to the warm hues of autumn, Bucks County emerges as a picturesque haven for fall farm festivities. Our charming region is home to an abundance of farms, each offering a unique and enriching experience. In the fall, they come alive with an array of delightful activities, offering an unparalleled opportunity for unforgettable adventures. From pumpkin patches and apple orchards to corn mazes and hayrides, Bucks County’s farms welcome visitors with open arms, promising cherished memories that will stay with you long after the season has passed.

Solebury Orchards

Immerse yourself in the essence of fall at Solebury Orchards. As summer fades, the orchards offer an allure of Pick-Your-Own experiences amidst the breathtaking autumn backdrop. 

Founded in 1985 by Brian Smith, the farm’s 80-acre expanse features not only natural beauty but also the renowned cider and exceptional quality of its produce. With weekend wagon rides guiding visitors through vibrant apple-picking adventures, this is the season to savor. Reserve your spot for weekend apple picking in September and October, and let Solebury Orchards be your gateway to the magic of fall.

Snipes Farm and Garden Center

Snipes Farm & Education Center in Morrisville welcomes families to embrace the delights of the Annual Fall Festival. With weekends in October dedicated to this festive affair, the farm’s inviting Market tempts with its famous apple donuts, accompanied by tractor-drawn wagon rides through the Land of the Scarecrows, and an opportunity to mingle with gentle farm animals. This seasonal celebration promises joy for all generations. 

Established in 2008 as a nonprofit educational organization, the farm holds deep historical roots, tracing back to the Snipes family who have farmed the land in Bucks County since 1688. As the leaves fall and the air grows crisper, the Snipes Farm Fall Festival beckons you to create cherished memories while connecting with nature and tradition.

Hellerick’s Family Farm

Experience the joy of autumn at Hellerick’s Family Farm. Embark on a delightful adventure as you stroll through picturesque sunflower fields, accessible either by a charming hayride or a leisurely walk. The Adventure Farm area provides endless entertainment for all ages. Thrill-seekers can dive into the Aerial Adventure Park featuring nine ziplines, 21 bridges, and a heart-pounding 30-foot tower free-fall. Visitors also have the opportunity to engage in a unique and unforgettable activity by joining Goat Yoga, while younger guests can interact with the goats through the Goat Experience. 

Hellrick’s revels in the harvest spirit with pick your own crops, exploring the playground, or immersing yourself in the enchanting pumpkin, squash, and gourd displays from late September to November. Celebrating over two centuries of tradition, Hellerick’s Family Farm continues to evolve while preserving its rich history, offering families a cherished destination in Bucks County.

AGA Farm

Fall festivities abound at AGA Farms in Perkasie, a purveyor of family fun since 1980. Starting in late September, the farm welcomes visitors with an array of hay rides, two distinct corn mazes, locally-crafted decor, and an unparalleled variety of pumpkin breeds.  A tractor-drawn wagon will gracefully transport you across the sprawling expanse of this picturesque 100-acre Bucks County farm – as you take in the beauty of the fields adorned with stretches of corn and soybeans, bountiful patches of pumpkins, serene ponds, the vibrant transformation of woodland leaves, and vast open spaces imbued with crisp, invigorating air. AGA Farm is also home to two enthralling corn mazes. Every year, the mazes are artfully crafted, inviting the brave-hearted to test their sense of direction. 

Shady Brook Farm

Experience a day of ultimate autumn enjoyment at Shady Brook Farm, where an abundance of options ensures an unforgettable Fall Fun adventure – the captivating allure of a Halloween wagon-drawn light show, rhythmic beats of live music filling the air, and a bustling market offering a variety of delights. 

Engage in play areas, partake in yard games, and immerse yourself in a diverse range of activities. Don’t miss the chance to secure a campfire space, perfect for family gatherings, birthday celebrations, or corporate events. Explore the pleasures of apple picking, venture into the pumpkin patch, take a leisurely sunflower stroll, and conquer the challenges of the five-acre corn maze. 

Delight in the thrills of the corn maze, Barn of Horror and Alien Encounter, both free of live actors, and bounce away on the Jumping Pillow. Race on the exhilarating SBF 500 Pedal Go-Carts, engage in friendly rubber ducky races, navigate the entertaining obstacle course, and relish the offerings of the BEARS Playground. Unearth hidden gems through gem mining, and try your hand at Wall Ball and Roller Bowler. And don’t forget to hitch a ride on the all-new cow train!
